dataValueTemplate.annotation: select IFNULL(AVG(t.tmsd),0) from (select TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,v.date_started,e.encounter_datetime) as tmsd from openmrs.encounter e, openmrs.visit v where e.visit_id = v.visit_id and e.encounter_id in (select s.encounter_id from (select e.encounter_id,min(e.encounter_datetime) as min from openmrs.encounter e group by e.visit_id) as s) and e.voided = 0 and DATE(v.date_started) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(v.date_started) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId ) as t
